post.summary: Enumerate tautomers for the given compounds.

post.description: Find canonical tautomer for all compounds in the `COMPOUND_FILE` input. This file should be a csv file where one column contains compounds as InChI or SMILES. The canonical compounds will be written as InChI and SMILES to the `OUTPUT_FILE`.
Calculate similarity between query and target compounds using chemical fingerprinting.
Find targets whose substructure matches with a query.

Find chemically similar compounds up to a certain threshold of similarity. This is much faster than /fingerprints/similarity because it uses the chemfp package and only returns matches that pass the threshold.
